Articles.Content:
I lurk around here everyday, because I have nothing better to do. There are some pretty interesting threads.

How much do you lurk around here, and in what sub-forums do you lurk?

I spam the "new posts" button until interesting stuff shows up.

I think this forum is my #1 visited webpage ATM.
I lurk here a lot too, usually in General KSP Discussion. I'm currently unemployed, but will be starting a new job before the end of September so I need to make the most of my free time!
are you lot suggesting there is a world out side the forums?

I was in this thread seventeen times and you only noticed this once.

*drops mic, walks out*
I lurk many hours per day! I have been on the forums for more than a year, but only about 400 posts. SO I lurk more often than I post.
I lurk a lot since I been here and don't really post much.
I lurk multiple times a day. After the forum crash I lost a ton of my reputation and nearly a thousand posts. I stopped posting after that.
I lurk like, all day. I do something besides that obviously
way too much.
I lurk everywhere, and post sometimes when I have something to good to say.
I try not to post unless I have something to say (yeah right...), so I do a lot of lurking.
^^ Same here. If I can't find something humorous, helpful, or acerbic to say, I just lurk. Lots of lurking going on.

A lot.

10char.
I've recently been offered a job at the local university as a professor in Lurkology but I turned it down as it would cut into my lurking time...

I've recently been offered a job at the local university as a professor in Lurkology but I turned it down as it would cut into my lurking time...

Clearly you are not at professorship tier lurking ability. A quality, professor level lurker would take the class, bring on a student teacher to run the lesson, then lurk his own class.

Often.

/10char

I do it quite a lot. I mainly stay in the Science Labs because admittedly, real life, while sometimes disappointing, is what really matters. Only the science, though. I don't care about anything but science. Maybe politics, too. But mostly science.
For every thread I post in, I've lurked around 4 others

I'm currently behind you NotFruit. Don't look, you won't see me.

ZodiaK. BTW, I like that poster. It's cute

I have the general forum set as my homeage.

But seriously, no serious lurker will respond.....
Almost exclusively. But I'm trying to change that. Make a name for myself, y'know?
I should have about 1k posts were it not for the Great Forum Derp. I don't lurk much I guess
Quite a lot. I love this game, I like passing on my knowledge, the questions forum is great for bouncing my brainstorming off people, and I require inspiration for future projects.

Pretty much not at all. I'm surprised this forum has relatively little activity for the reasonable popularity it has.

But i generally reply to alot of the threads i visit and find interesting
